Title: Study Marxism-Leninism to see and think clearly
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: The woman on the right holds "The State and Revolution" (国家与革命) by Lenin, first published 1918.The slogan in the background, top left: "Study well the theory of the dictatorship of the proletariat" (学好无产阶级专政的理论).
